page.title: 04CHANGES CONT.
page.content: more people.{Mr. Palmer}has been a {farmer}all his working life. Before modern transport came in every thing had to be transported by{barge}or {train. Mr. Palmer}remembers when there were hardly any{cars.}During the{war {Mr. Palmer}was made a{constable.}He didn't have any food shortages during the{war}because he could make things like butter and had meat off his animals. People in the country came off best when it came to food. There was a{bomb}dropped about a mile away from the farm.{Mr. Palmer}remembers people taking the{metal gates}off the {churchyard}for{ammunition}during the {war. Apart from farming{Mr. Palmer}has an {orchard.}He holds three offices in the village. He doesn't have much spare time but he likes to help people in the village.
